Reword this while keeping all of the facts the same. Just make it more unbiased and intellectual. Adhere to the product description manual. Don't change much other than the structure of some sentences and word choice. Keep the over all structure and facts the same.


The Reprocessed ViewFlex Xtra Intracardiac Echocardiography (ICE) Catheter is designed to be inserted into the heart to visualize cardiac structures and blood flow within the heart in adolescent and adult patients. The device features a 64-element phased array transducer as well as 4-way steering that is controllable via the device's handle with two deflection mechanisms that correspond with the movement of the distal shaft in the four planes of movement, which enables optimal viewing planes. This reprocessed device is identical to the OEM version offered by Abbott Laboratories but is sterilized and treated by Sterlimed before being reused. The catheter is intended to have an ergonomic handle with auto-lock steering that is designed to allow for single-handed operation, minimizing catheter repositioning. Furthermore, the handle has two deflection mechanisms that correspond with the movement of the distal shaft in the four planes of movement, which is intended to enable optimal viewing planes.

The Reprocessed ViewFlex Xtra Ice Catheter is compatible with ViewMate II, ViewMate Z or ViewMate and Philips CX50 ultrasound consoles via the use of a compatible ViewFlex Catheter interface module.2 / 2

The Reprocessed ViewFlex Xtra Intracardiac Echocardiography (ICE) Catheter is intended for use in adolescent and adult patients for visualization of cardiac structures and blood flow within the heart. The device boasts a 64-element phased array transducer and 4-way steering capabilities, which can be controlled through the handle featuring two deflection mechanisms corresponding to the movement of the distal shaft in four planes. This version of the catheter is identical to the original equipment manufacturer (OEM) version offered by Abbott Laboratories, but has undergone sterilization and processing by Sterlimed prior to reuse.

The ergonomic handle of the Reprocessed ViewFlex Xtra ICE Catheter is designed for single-handed operation with an auto-lock steering mechanism, reducing the need for catheter repositioning. The two deflection mechanisms allow for optimal viewing in four planes, in line with the movement of the distal shaft. The catheter is compatible with ViewMate II, ViewMate Z, ViewMate, and Philips CX50 ultrasound consoles when used with a compatible ViewFlex Catheter interface module.

The catheter is intended for use in adolescent and adult patients to visualize cardiac structures and blood flow within the heart. Uses:
The TE7 Max is a general purpose diagnostic ultrasound system intended for ultrasound imaging, measurement, display, and analysis of the human body and fluid.
Components:
The TE7 Max Ultrasound system comprises a LED monitor with a high-resolution display, a touch-enabled interface with customizable multi-gesture support, a large storage basket designed for greater utility, a sealed interface designed for fluid resistance and ease of disinfection, elevated transducer mounting, dedicated disinfectant holder, and a retractable cord intended to reduce tripping hazards and contamination.
Features:
The TE7 Max is provided with an extensive suite of specialty transducers and AI-powered software applications, contended to enhance patient outcomes.
The TE7 Max’s cardiac imaging and capabilities, including Auto EF and TEE imaging, combined with automated fluid management tools designed for Critical Care environments. 
The TE7 Max is equipped with needle enhancement technologies such as eSpacial Navi 4D magnetic needle navigation technology and iNeedle+ visualization technology designed to help streamline workflow and improve accuracy with needle-guided procedures.
The TE7 Max host a suite of AI tools such as:
Smart B-Line is designed to enable rapid assessment of lung tissue by automatically calculating number and area percentage of B-Lines according to user-selected protocols.
Smart FHR designed to provide automated fetal heart rate calculation utilizing B-mode echo data.
Auto EF is designed to provide proprietary technology to analyze 2D echo data to automatically calculate EDV/ESV/EF for left ventricle function evaluation.
Smart VTI is designed to provide automated Velocity Time integral (VTI) and Cardiac Output (CO) measurements enable rapid cardiac function assessment.
Smart IVC is designed to provide automated measurement of Inferior Vena Cava (IVC) helps assess volume status and guides fluid management.
Smart Bladder is designed to provide automated measurement of bladder volume to pre and post void measurements.

Modes of operation for the system include: B, M, PWD, CWD, Color Doppler, Amplitude Doppler, Combined mode, Tissue Harmonic Imaging, Contrast imaging,TDI, Color M, Smart 3D, and iScape View

Please write a new PRODUCT DESCRIPTION in paragraph form, using the rules laid out in the product description manual above, for the product "TE7 Max Ultrasound System" in 185 words3 / 3

The TE7 Max Ultrasound System is a general purpose diagnostic device designed for the ultrasound imaging, measurement, display and analysis of the human body and fluid. The system is equipped with advanced features to enhance patient outcomes and streamline workflow. The TE7 Max comprises a LED monitor with high-resolution display, a touch-enabled interface, a large storage basket, a sealed interface for fluid resistance and ease of disinfection, elevated transducer mounting, dedicated disinfectant holder, and a retractable cord to reduce tripping hazards and contamination. The system comes with an extensive suite of specialty transducers and AI-powered software applications, including cardiac imaging and fluid management tools designed for critical care environments. The TE7 Max also features needle enhancement technologies such as eSpacial Navi 4D magnetic needle navigation and iNeedle+ visualization technology to improve accuracy with needle-guided procedures. The TE7 Max offers a suite of AI tools for rapid assessment and measurement, including Smart B-Line, Smart FHR, Auto EF, Smart VTI, Smart IVC, and Smart Bladder. The system supports various modes of operation, including B, M, PWD, CWD, Color Doppler, Amplitude Doppler, Combined mode, Tissue Harmonic Imaging, Contrast imaging, TDI, Color M, Smart 3D, and iScape View.
